required: ✅ Content is rewritten in original language
✅ Original value is added to each answer
✅ No direct copying of substantial portions
recommended: 💡 Add practical examples and use cases
🎯 Focus on user problems, not just features

official.name: Official Documentation
official.approach: Extract concepts, rewrite explanations, add practical context

community.name: Community Discussions
community.approach: Identify common problems, create comprehensive solutions

original.name: Original Content
original.approach: Document real-world usage patterns and solutions

content: Each answer solves a real user problem
Code examples are included where helpful
seo: Content is scannable with clear structure
